Articles.Content: Umm he's Mia, I kinda threw a fit and forced closed when the plane he was in crashed because symmetry broke on on me and only half my engine/control surfaces were set.
Mine is in very little pieces somewhere in the stratosphere!
My jeb is currently turning into diamonds as we speak in the core of Jool.

I have multiple savefiles, so let's see...

Dead, dead, retrograde Eeloo intercept, broken lander in Kerbin's Grasslands, dead, protesting how robots are taking his job, broken airplane cockpit on Minnmus, dead, and trapped underneath a Duna rover.

I have a lot of savefiles.

Edited July 10, 2017 by Confused Scientist
Mines orbiting the sun
Recovering at KSC after a tragic spaghettification incident.

Um... in my sandbox I have lost all contact with anything remotely resembling an orange jumpsuit.  ...and frankly, I've grown accustomed to not actually asking their names anymore for fear of becoming attached.
Burning up in the atmosphere, I'm sure he's fine.

Jeb got out to float in the orbit of Eve, and I forgot that he was there. So I 'rescued' him by putting him back in the craft, and now I'm too lazy to send him back to Kerbin. So he's just sitting in the craft. Imagine what sitting for years at a time must do to a man!

Project Intrepid Jeb: Aboard the ITV-009 "Intrepid" coming back from a Duna mission. He launched about a year ago, actually. I really need to continue that mission report.

Voyage: The Final Warning Jeb: Aboard the "VOYAGER" transferring to Pol (in the story he's still orbiting Vall, but gameplay progresses faster than writing).

Solid Booster Grand Tour Jeb: Dead after a solid rocket Eve ascent vehicle test. After I have all of the craft designed, I'll start over with everyone alive and no debris around to actually do the grand tour.
Right now he is at my Mün Base. Currently under construction.
Experimenting with @Cupcake...'s delta flyers. I'll try to get some pictures.

1 hour ago, DeltaDizzy said:

Experimenting with @Cupcake...'s delta flyers. I'll try to get some pictures.

Now really? Mine is doing exactly the same today!

My Jeb is in the doghouse.  He's out of fuel, orbiting Mun and I think I'll leave him there until he learns his lesson.

He blew a full 1/3 of my budget on some hair brained idea to accomplish several Munar tasks at once.  Two kerbalnauts are stranded in prograde, elliptical Munar orbits, a flag must be planted, and Munar science must be one.  Jeb here has the bright idea to build the mother of all lander/orbiter combos to "get it all done in one trip".   The only compartment he has access to that can hold the two rescuees is a huge hitchhiker module, add in enough fuel for that mass and all the accoutrements, and I ended up shelling out 120,000  kerbal bucks to get that 24 ton mess into oribit in one shot and then to the Mun.  Then good 'ol Jeb here decides to not fully throttle down the engine on the way to the mun, leaving it gaining momentum and consuming fuel, so what was left was used in a white-knuckle bid to slow that monstrosity into a prograde Munar orbit.
Jeb just flew to the Mun for my first time. He came back and is ready to go up again.
Flying my SF-2 fighter at the moment, with Val and 'Siddorf' on the sides.

Well, to be honest he's been jumping into every prototype craft possible in my sandbox save  I rarely play Career Mode (If I did it would be a heavily modified funds based save) and so the only missions anyone goes on are simple LKO and back tests for lifters or testing out toroidal space station hinges. Though this might change sometime...
mine is in a .cfg file somewere in the KSP loading code...AND THATS WHERE ALL OF YOUR JEBS ARE!
Mine is in a .sfs...

He's stepping through the door, floating a most peculiar way, he tells me the stars look very different today. Sitting in a tin can far above the world, Kerbin is blue and there's not much Jeb can do.
At home watching the fireworks from a safe distance with Bill, Bob, and Val. I retired them so randoms would lead the horde scrambling over each other to pile into space.

My Jeb is in my computer doing completely nothing but enjoy the summer.

(the truth: my computer is overheating and can(might) cook Jeb)

Orbiting Kerbin waiting for me to send up the interplanetary stage of his Duna lander, yet I refuse to upgrade the VAB so the interplanetary stage is being more difficult then it was intended to be.

Edited August 27, 2017 by Gezzabeast

Dead after buzzing the tower. The KSC shot him down after his 100th fly-by  

Edited July 17, 2017 by Lo Var Lachland
He's been taken off the flight roster for the time being, after the test flight of a new mini-shuttle discovered that it has a tendency to perform mid-air stunts at inappropriate times.
